slides.title: Seeds Are Live
slides.body: We standardized ‘Seeds’: static-first micro-site bundles you can reskin and deploy fast.\n\nThis episode is a portrait slideshow + playlist template.

slides.title: What’s in a Seed
slides.body:
index.html + styles.css + app.js + PROMPTS + deploy guide + assets.

Optional: PWA manifest + SW.

Goal: no framework, no build step, ship clean.

slides.title: Profiles
slides.body:
SeedGen profiles: celestine / music_drop / onboarding.

Profiles set defaults; CLI overrides anything.

From now on: spawn a seed first, then customize.

slides.title: Call to Action
slides.body:
All micro-sites are Seeds.

Pick profile → generate → swap assets → deploy.

Ping with seed name + profile for first round tracking.
